channel.title: If someone hacks my WIFI connection
channel.description:
Can they see anything on my screen or install malware on my device?
Can they see what websites I'm visiting if I'm using TOR + VM?
Are there any other attacks I may be vulnerable to if this happens?

item.title: If someone hacks my WIFI connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s only hardening. Nothing works as a prevention.

Read full topic
item.source: If someone hacks my WIFI connection

item.title: If someone hacks my WIFI connection
item.description:
Are there any other attacks I may be vulnerable to if this happens?
- exploits against host dhcp server - exploits against wifi stack - exploits against tcp stack - kernel exploits - much more

But all this stuff is mostly unrelated to Whonix. Applies to general computer security considerations.
[/quote]

Would hardening with AppArmor protect my device from these exploits?

Appreciate the help, btw.

Read full topic
item.source: If someone hacks my WIFI connection

item.title: If someone hacks my WIFI connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can they see what websites I'm visiting if I'm using TOR + VM?
Just Tor traffic. [and host traffic]
Can they see anything on my screen or install malware on my device?
Not without https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exploit_%28computer_security%29 and skill.
Are there any other attacks I may be vulnerable to if this happens?
- exploits against host dhcp server - exploits against wifi stack - exploits against tcp stack - kernel exploits - much more

But all this stuff is mostly unrelated to Whonix. Applies to general computer security considerations.

Read full topic
item.source: If someone hacks my WIFI connection
